name: Collaborate respectfully.
description: Treat others with respect and kindness, friend or foe. We're all here to learn and have fun.

name: Offer assistance.
description: When a team member is struggling, offer to help guide them to the solution.

name: Discover.
description: Have a passion to keep trying and searching for answers, solutions, and knowledge.

name: Reap rewards.
description: Be one of the top three participants on the winning team to claim a prize! You must be over the age of thirteen and a resident of the United States to be eligible to win prizes. The prizes will be announced at the beginning of the competition in an announcement in the official Discord server (April 28).

name: Unleash your creativity.
description: Don't be confined by what has been done before. Imagine what could be.
